properties.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 3:20AM EST until January 23 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level
expected along shorelines and tidal waterways (7.1 to 7.3 feet
Mean Lower Low Water at Charleston).

* WHERE...Coastal Colleton and Charleston Counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...This could result in some roads becoming impassable.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide will occur around 6:53 AM today
at Charleston. Saltwater inundation will be possible 1 to 2
hours before and after high tide.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING
